sourcesContent: import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-breeds-list", templateUrl: "./breeds-list.component.html", styleUrls: ["./breeds-list.component.scss"], }) export class BreedsListComponent { public breeds = [ { breed: "Affenpinscher", country: "Germany", origin: "Mid-19th century", coat: "Short", pattern: "Solid", }, { breed: "Afghan Hound", country: "Afghanistan", origin: "13th century", coat: "Long", pattern: "Solid", }, ]; }
